parameters: This... seems to be some sort of village.
We're supposed to be in the building, right?
Kann, this is most likely a Memory Space.
As to whose memory it belongs to...
I can't say for sure yet.
We encountered it back when, uh...
When we explored your path with Tahati, right?
That's what I'd like to confirm.
Does this village look familiar to you?
I'd never have cared to remember such a
If I recall, Memory Space is supposed to be
That's true, though it's still just a guess.
If Kann doesn't remember this place,
then the two are probably unrelated...
If I recall, way back then──
